scripts.test-all: npm run test; npm run test -ws -if-present
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean-build -ws -if-present; rm -rf mortgageformresources gen mta_archives mtad.yaml mortgagecalc.mtar | find . -type d -name '*_build_tmp' -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.fullclean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; npm run clean-build; npm run clean-cds-models
scripts.deploy-calcularor-module: mbt module-build -m mortgagecalc-calculator-service -g; cf deploy -m mortgagecalc-calculator-service
scripts.deploy-site-module: mbt module-build -m mortgagecalc-site-service -g; cf deploy -m mortgagecalc-site-service
scripts.deploy-database: npx cds build --production; mbt module-build -m mortgagecalc-db-deployer -g; cf deploy -m mortgagecalc-db-deployer
